Do not stay here   Horrible customer service and mediocre accommodations   Look for another unit  Im shocked that I was told by one of your agents that I would be compensated for the three hours I was locked out of your unit and never heard anything back  I was locked out of the unit for   hours due to the electronic locking system malfunction   It took Ive an hour for the cleaning person to show up and try the exact same thing I was trying to do to open the unit  This didnt work  as I stated to the agent several times   It then took an additional two hours for someone to show up with the master key to get in   I was told that I would be compensated for my time and Never heard back from anyone   What a joke

We stayed from Monday Friday and location was excellent  Right on division street  close to restaurants  the      if you like to run   and Milwaukee street  It was clean for the most part and the kitchen appliances and washer and drier came in handy  Parking is a little stressful but we figured it out  The coffee shop across the street has amazing coffee and pastries  WiFi in the living room is stronger than the kitchen  The sun room is a nice extra space just perfect to do some morning yoga or sip your coffee  The google nest was locked so we had to request for it to be unlocked to fit our temperature needs and they were flexible about it  The neighbors are smokers so sometimes the space smells like weed and cigarettes but we informed the host and continued to spray Lysol  Theres a church next door that rings the bells at different times of the day  Aside from the smells  we enjoyed our stay

The place was nice  but extremely cold   The thermostat was set to an automatic    degrees and to return to this temperature after adjusting to a more comfortable temperature in a couple hours   This was annoying    It was noisy at night   There is a club across the street that was outdoors in the street  the street was blocked off due to social distancing   I suppose    It was nice to hear a DJ the first night  but every night of my stay was a bit much    especially from the yelling and screaming of partiers    Lastly   the common area at the rooftop was not clean     Overall   this was a good experience  Please remove the automated thermostat to give guests an opportunity to set the temperature of the room to what is comfortable for them   I was able to adjust it  but it only would stay the adjusted temperature for   hours      is far too cold for me  There was a couple of dust balls around as id someone swept and left a small pile  Mark did let me know they had lots of checkins which slowed down the response time  A book of experiences   local restaurants and to dos

Does not describe exactly as in photos  Overall not bad for short stay When we walk on the floor  creeking sound was coming especially in bedroom and hall   I found some dirty marks on the kitchen floor and in bathroom corners  There is no way for us to control the heat  Bedroom went so hot in the nights  The pans in the kitchen were worned out and we could not use them  These things need to be improved for better stay in future

This is my  nd Zencity stay and I have to say this apartment was quite disappointing from the other  The cleanliness of this apartment is lacking  its quite dingy  The couch is stained and the walls are not painted well leaving lots of crack and patches of paints  The apartment does not have forks or cooking oil or pepper  Legit  one fork and salt  There could be some major updates and this place would be worth the nightly cost  Yes  the view is nice but not worth the lack of cleanliness or care of the unit  The bed was comfortable but the bathroom was aold and has a lot of rust and spots on the ceiling  If youre a clean freak like me  I wouldnt recommend this apartment but if those things dont matter to you  then do you     also  the amenities are a plus  Restaurant and market on site  I was quite disappointed in this apartment  This is my  nd stay with Zencity  The apartment only has one fork and is not ready for a stay  No cooking oil or pepper either  The apartment can do some paining and upgrading as well  Please make it better
Nice location

The place was nice and definitely recommend staying there  The host is quick to reply  No issues with check in  Only recommendation Is to look ahead into parking  It does not include private parking  There is street parking and if you take Hyde street down to the left  and then a right at the light  There is additional parking there  There are parking ramps which are costly but optional  The place was great  we enjoyed the availability with the wifi  It is much better than having to message the host to resolve it  It was in a nice spot the only downside was the parking  I do not mind paying for parking but it would have been nice to have a separate area for guest  I think this was on my part but I did not realize the check in was in the building across  It took us a  minute to find but it was fine  n a

Nice place  convenient location  They have a French press coffee maker but no coffee  good thing there is a coffee place about a   minute walk down the street  Bring your own toiletries and toothpaste etc bc there is none  Overall nice stay Thanks for the stay  as a fellow host I wanted to point these things out  There were a ton of gauges and marks all over the walls  The console table leg was broken and uneven  the couch slopes to the floor  There was no coffee for the coffee maker  Not enough shampoo soap for   people  The shower floor was gross and needs a deep clean  There is a wood shim under the waterfall island  I think u need to send a painting crew in to put a new coat on walls and fix everything and a new cleaning crew  the exhaust vent was covered in dust and the filter in the furnace looks like it was never changed Butterfly panel wasnt working

The apartment is great   The location  right in the heart of the Country Club Plaza  cannot be beat  The apartment was extremely clean and inviting  Its a large space and could use a little more furniture and wall decor  There is only one night stand in the bedroom which is a pet peeve for me  I also missed not having a tv in the bedroom  We had an issue getting access to the parking garage but once we worked it out it was perfect  We had someone park in our allotted space one night and I read in another review that another traveler had the same issue  It would be nice to know where to park in the event that happens  It was too late to call Zencity so it was a little nerve wracking that night   We travel to Kansas City often and would consider the apartment again  For the most part Zencity was very responsive  We did have an issue using the fob to access the parking garage  I didnt get a response from them but eventually solved the issue with the apartment building rental office  The other times I contacted Zencity they responded quickly    The property could use more detailed information in the apartment regarding the parking garage and using the door fob
Lock your car doors  Sheets were soiled as well  The bedding was very clear soiled
Location is great and quick response

Is a good apartment with a great location to good food  There was construction going in the building the whole   weeks I was there  Since the walls were thin it made it quite loud staring at  am  Once the construction is done this will be a great place  The kitchen dishes were a bit dirty when I arrived and it would have been nice to get the check out reminders the day before instead of after I had already left

The style was nice   the unit was clean  However  the kitchen had very few items  very few choices cook with and no utensils besides basic fork spoon  the unit wasnt extremely easily to enter  There are multiple steps to take before getting into your unit   back outside  but being a repurposed building its to be expected  Overall it was a good stay in a nice clean location

Space is as described  Walking distance to good restaurants  Need more amenities in the kitchen  extra hooks or bar in the bathroom to hang clothes etc  The space is good but doesnt have the special touches to WOW  Thanks for letting us stay in the house  The space was as described  quite large and spacious  However  seem very bland  Need to add more color and touches to the house make it warm and cozy  The chairs and the breakfast table in the living room are of cheap quality  in fact one of the chairs is broken and the others are vey slippery on the wooden floor  My   year old son slipped while sitting on the chair and cut his lip  Need more amenities in the kitchen  extra hooks or bar in the bathroom to hang clothes etc  The furnace works well but quite loud especially in the night  The space is OK but doesnt have the special touches to WOW

If you want a nice apartment with an awesome downtown location  this is the perfect place for you  The unit was very clean  stylish  and well secured   Some things to know    there is a kitchen with pots and pans  but there is minimal dish ware  Bring your own laundry detergent if you plan on doing laundry  There is shampoo and conditioner there  but theyre travel size and dont last long if youre staying for an extended period  This listing says parking is    day  but its actually     day  Theres also not really any street parking around the building so you have to park in the garage  The listing doesnt mention it  but there is a beautiful rooftop garden on the  th floor that you can use   Overall  I would definitely stay here again  I loved the space and location  I would just update that parking is actually     day because that adds up quickly  I would also add that theres a garden terrace for guests to use because it was an awesome amenity   Also  there were pictures of multiple units that were posted on this listing  I loved the place I stayed in  but some of the pictures on this listing were of a different unit  The photo included on the email zoomed in on the app so you couldnt see where the lock boxes were  This wasnt something I realized until I logged onto my computer and saw it  So maybe put two separate pictures

Very simple modern place  love the location as far as proximity to things to do downtown however  parking is a big yikes  The garage was far too expensive  a local suggested parking in a neighborhood not too far from the Airbnb which was free just a walk away which wasnt bad  If youre busy during the day parking isnt a huge issue if youre around and about but if you need to park during the day I suggest a neighborhood with free street parking and walking  at night it wasnt too bad  found a spot just a block away

This property was ok  The view was spectacular but it was decent  unfortunately during the visit my guests and I shocking observed a porn video shoot in the high rise condos across the balcony  Im glad there was no kids staying and the filters immediately stopped once they saw us calling authorities  The location was also boarded up so we had a hard time locating the building due to the wooden boarded up windows    I would told that the check in couldnt not earlier due to housekeeping throughly cleaning the apartment  However  we observed a leftover bag in the refrigerator w  molded food inside  The screen on the balcony was broken  The parking was awful and very expensive        for       nites   Zencity was immediately notified about the above issued but nothing was done  The apartment did what it needed to do which was provide me and my guests a bed and a bathroom  I dont think i would book with this location again  It was nice but not worth       I know this is not a zencity concern but the parking in the immediate area of the apartment was extremely expensive  I paid a total of      for       days  The refrigerator has food leftover inside of it from a prior occupants

I want to be able to recommend this  because had it been clean it would have been great  Hoping its a fluke  But the place was gross  Food stuck to the stove backsplash  sticky alcohol rings on the desks  hair on the carpets and in the sinks   I didnt stay here  I have to travel for work or I wouldnt  WE ARE IN A PANDEMIC  corners cannot be cut on cleaning   Plus  yes they refunded their part but  I still lost     in service fees and    to park in their garage for the    minutes I was there  Not a great experience  I know its not one specific persons fault  but in a normal world I expect to not have hair clumps on the rugs  rings of sticky alcohol on the desks  etc  In a NORMAL world  We are in a worldwide pandemic  Protocol needs to be better The instructions do TRY to be clear But they need updated because the key pad is broken  you have to call a    go to a whole New garage  Its just a bit of a hassle  And then there are elevators right inside the door that ARE NOT the elevators you have to use so thats confusing  Then the elevators have a scan pad outside AND inside  i had to have someone help Me  They made an effort but It wasnt immediate

This is the second time that I reside at a Zencity owned property and the price  location and cleanness of the apartment were all satisfying and on point    The two main issues that I encountered is that the internet connect was very poor and that the messages from the host were  too much  automated so that my questions were either not answered accurately or completely ignored Thank you for hosting us at your place  Everything looked clean and tidy  Main comments over the place the I have are that the internet was not working  I was able to connect to it once but it was slow and sometime later I got disconnected and never been able to connect again  Another things is the the messages are  too much  automated to the extent that my questions were either not answered accurately or completely ignored    But again  the check in was easy and the location  price and the cleanness of the apartment itself were all on point  Automated responses ignore questions asked

It was a nice place  they had subscription services to watch on TV  Theres not a whole lot of space inside the apartment  but its a lovely apartment  Additionally  the check in process was awful for me  as I was there for an hour and a half before I was able to get into the apartment  Additionally  I paid for   nights  and I had to pay for parking  which cost me half of what the entire apartment cost me  Thanks for being a good host  There were a few issues with my stay which I mentioned before  mainly parking and checking in   but I would also like to suggest putting a coffee machine in the airbnb  I was upset when I noticed your french press was not a complete set so I was unable to make coffee in the mornings     The key fob was broken when I arrived so wouldnt work on any of the elevators or door entrances  Was unable to request another from office  Didnt mention that the door handle was broken and hard to open  so it was closed until the host explained that the door was broken  Additionally  when the host dropped off the working fob  they gave me the wrong code for the lockbox  I was trying to get into the apartment for an hour and a half before I was able to get inside and put my stuff down  Didnt answer any messages that I sent  but luckily did answer the phone calls  If there was free parking  I spent over      in parking for   days because there was no free parking available  on the street or in the parking garage
clean  nice space  apartment smelled strongly of weed for most of the night
Bare bones but the place was clean and location was great  Thrid floor hallway light was out  Two evenings unable to watch Netflix because too many accounts were logged in

The place is really near Chicago which is ideal for viewing the city  In terms of decor  it was styled pretty well  Brian was very quick to respond and extremely informative  My only complaint  and I understand that its one thats hard to fix  is that the floor and doors were squeaky  Since you have to walk through some rooms to get to the next bathroom or living room  it made it hard to get through the house without waking anyone up during the night  Thank you for being so quick to respond  Id like to mention that there wasnt enough toilet paper for us  one in some restrooms  and we had to go buy our own
Love the apt and there was a lot of parking
Mattress and couch cushions smelled very bad  Carpet had black mold  Mattress and couch cushions smelled very bad  Carpet had black mold

This stay was decent  The listing and location were accurate and the room was comfortable and fairly clean  However there were two blinds missing from the windows  reducing the feeling of privacy and safety  The biggest issue was the keypad  Upon arrival I spent about    minutes standing outside the door trying to get in  After two failed attempts at using two different passcodes I was finally given a Bluetooth key  which worked well and was pretty convenient  until about three days later when the Bluetooth key failed to work as well and I had to call twice before I got an answer and some help  I will say that Zencity customer service is very polite  friendly  and helpful  which made the frustration of being unable to get inside my room a little less infuriating  Aside from these issues  the place was nice and overall I enjoyed my time here  Keypad failed to work for initial check in and continued to experience issues throughout the trip

Very nice space in an even better location  Walking distance to the River Market  Power Light District  etc  I parked in the   hour parking  free from  pm  am  every night for my    day stay and never had an issue  My only complaint is how unresponsive the hosts  Zencity company employees  can be  Counter tops in kitchen were dirty  floor in bathroom dirty  I called to check about parking  no answer so I left a message and nobody got back to me  One day my bedroom light went out and I messaged the host who said theyd contact maintenance ASAP and nobody ever came to fix the light
Okay  WiFi didnt work  and I had online school  It was very frustrating  We didnt have WiFi during our entire stay and it was never addressed

Great place in a great location

Great experience and value  The space was exactly what we expected  We would certainly stay again the next time we visit KC

Very cute space in a nice area  right in downtown  Only blocks away from Power   Light District  Very clean and spacious  Would recommend this spot to anyone  Thanks for being a great host  Only thing to mention was unfortunately the water was shut off from   AM  PM during the one day of our stay  I figured you just were not aware of that work being done  just would have been nice to know  thats all  Otherwise  very cute space in a great area

The space is beautiful and we really enjoyed our stay  The kitchen is a bit under equipped and the TV does not have capability to log into anything like Netflix  Prime  etc  There is a local satellite attached to the TV that got a few channels but the reception was poor so we didnt use it  In the kitchen  there isnt a coffee maker or many pots pans to cook with  We ended up purchasing a larger frying pan during our stay and left it behind for future guests  All of that said  we still loved our stay  thought the place was well decorated  and very clean  Thank you  It would be helpful to have a bit more of an equipped kitchen  There was a broken spatula and only very small pans to use  We ended up purchasing a larger frying pan during our stay and left it behind for future guests

Cool spot great location We were told that there was other zen city rooms in the building  If thats the case and people show up and their room that is costing them      for three nights isnt ready  maybe instead of making them just wait  Get them taken care of so you dont have to tired  possibly very irritated    year olds bothering the nice door girl in the building  Or offer a discount for their experience  This was my first Airbnb stay in Chicago  We usually get a hotel and I have to say I prefer the Airbnb but not      that when we come back up in October we will be staying in one  We were told we could check in at      we arrived and were told it wasnt going to be ready until       Having our car parked already and our bagS in tow  this was very inconvenient  Then when we were able to enter the key pads battery was dead  That took a few trips up stairs and phone calls  Lets just say we were very frustrated after already being in the car for   hours  Last thing we wanted was to hangout in the lobby waiting to get in  Balcony needs love  windows were very dirty and t there was at least   good size spiders that have webs all over above your head  Being ready on time and a       checkout
Nice place other than door lock leaving me in hall for hours After the door lock malfunctioned i was left waiting in the hallway for hours
Great location  amazing rooftop views

Beautiful place but it has large rats  I would bet stay there if I was you  The place it self was beautiful however  it has a rodent problem  I saw a few large rats and they were running up and down the hallway late at night  Also  they were eating my bread and fruits  I would never stay there nor would I recommend it to anyone else  Had issues with getting into to the building and the unit upon check but even though in was after hours the host did respond quickly  However  later I had additional issues with with digital key  Still the host was very responsive  Thanks for that  Nice place beside the rodent problem  But there was a big RAT in my unit

The location and ease of getting in was great  Trains are noisy but location makes everything walkable  The bathroom could have been cleaner but everything was ok

This is simple and stylish place to stay while in Chicago  Near countless places to eat and other attractions  No issues with check in or check out  The space was stylish but I do wish it could have been a bit cleaner  I would also consider leaving more cleaning products for guest in case they have any spills or just  want to do their own cleaning after check in or before check out  Loved the washer and dryer  very convenient  Check in and check out instructions were clear and the place was easy to find  The drawers in the bathroom had a lot of hairs and dried spills from previous guest   Stain on bathroom ceiling     The trash can lid was broken and the body of the trash can had some spills on it  I wiped down all the areas I thought were kinda messy  This may not bother other guest but Im an anal clean freak unfortunately  Next to El train but not as noisy as expected  The walls were scuffed and rug had a couple dark stains as if something was stuck in them  The lid of the trash can was broken  Soap dispenser in bathroom was defective  Simply put  I didnt feel like I was having a vacation experience  It was more like staying at a friends place while they were away  Could not find a switch for the light above the dining table

Pros great space super stylish Lots of amenities  tons of great restaurants  bike rentals nearby  Washer  Dryer Firestick for the TV  Cons  rd floor no elevator  Pigeons roosting outside bedroom window Great space great value   just a few things need to be addressed there was a chair with a broken leg that my cousin fell out of no fault of her own   there is also broken window in the livingroom that was taped up   There was also another window in the middle bedroom that wouldnt close properly and because of that mosquitoes got into the room   Lastly I think you should give guests access to the thermostat because regardless of the season some people are cold during warm seasons and others hot during cold  but either way people just want to be comfortable thanks  in advance for your hospitality  We had as n issue with temperature and it was resolved after   emails were sent

My husband and I stayed here for one week while visiting our new grandchild   Location was perfect for us and the neighborhood is nice and it is an easy walk to many shops and restaurants   Parking is free on the street   but it is difficult to find a spot   We found a spot on the street on day   of our stay and left the car there for the remainder of our stay   We did use SpotHero the first day and were able to park in a lot that was very close to the apartment   The unit is spacious with plenty of room for two people   Bed is comfortable and bedroom closet had plenty of hangers and a luggage rack which is always a nice touch   Building is quiet and we never heard any noise from neighbors   Wifi worked great which was appreciated due to having to work remotely a few days during our stay   The A C unit was loud when it was running  but did adequately cool the apartment   The couch in the living room looks great and appears to be new  but is is extremely uncomfortable   Kitchen is minimally stocked   This wasnt a concern for us as we were not planning on preparing any meals n the unit   Only a thin dishtowel was provided in the kitchen   no dishcloth  pot holders  or detergent for the dishwasher were provided   The grout in the tub area as well as the shower curtain could be cleaner and the back of the bathroom door was cracked   Only one hand towel    bath towels and   wash cloths were provided   which is minimal for   adults staying for   days   Overall the price was right for this apartment and we would likely book again  Need to provide more towels   One hand towel for   people for a week is not sufficient   Also  no dishcloth or potholders provided in kitchen   No dishwasher detergent was provided  Grout needs to be cleaned in the shower  rug in the bedroom had visible stains

Check in process was a good way to get your key however when we were at the kiosk we entered our code to retreive our key and got a message saying  the code was not correlated with a key  after talking with   zencity representitives and setting us back    minutes  at least  we were able to use an extra key and fob  Aside from the check in process  our stay was quiet while we were in the apartment  We never heard our neighbors except for the occasional door closing  The building itself smelled of marijuana  Although this isnt the hosts problem it still influenced our stay  The location is in a great area of St  Louis with it being in the central west end  A lot of places to go and forest park was very close  In closing  i would rent here again  The negatives would not deter me from considering this place in the future  The key to the apartment i booked was not available  It took an extra    minutes to get the extra key and   different people through zencity

Zencity place was overall a decent stay  The parking could be a bit challenging depending on the day   the place wasnt as clean as expected however it was still a decent stay    zencity was very friendly and straight to the point  Hey zencity it was overall a decent stay  It was just a little dirty in certain areas like the bedroom    living room  However we enjoyed our stay  Thank you for everything The night stands in the bedroom were a bit dirty   so was the bed itself along with the couch in the living room

The   th floor apartment offered a great western facing view of Forest Park and was surprisingly spacious   One elevator was broken which occasionally made for longer waits to get up and down  The kitchen was well stocked for prepping meals  and the Whole Foods just down the street was a great source of ingredients   The apartment has a clean minimalist look to it  although perhaps too much so   The bedroom walls were bare white and had no furniture aside from the low to the floor platform bed   A C was plenty adequate  and views from the rooftop at night were stellar   Frequent sirens can be heard due to nearby hospitals  but that is to be expected   Street parking only   Overall  a great Airbnb in a safe area that I would stay at again  One of the elevators was not working and the apartment was on the   th floor leading to long waits
A few missing light bulbs I think the unit had been neglected there were no trash bags or a key fob so going in and out was very inconvenient  I will say its worth the cost and a nice place

Place was decent  The building an amenities are awesome  but the actual unit needs some  TLC Place smelt of mildew Place smelt of mildew  the shower doesnt drain  bathroom doors dont lock  tv remotes were dead  internet had to get reset   times

You can expect a beautiful spotless home close to power and light  with a wonderful host as she provided breakfast foods  was a lifesaver     The only downfall about this place is the neighbor directly next to this home have a huge dog and never stops barking  you cant use the backyard cause the dog will go nuts and not stop  we even got woken up the next morning from the barking  since one of the rooms is directly next to the house its very loud  I enjoyed the home very much though and made for a good stay after the Super Bowl  Go Chiefs    I had said  shhhh   very respectfully  to the neighbors dog  on the right when directly facing house  while we were out back hanging out  since the neighbors had been on the front porch they were yelling the dogs name  after I had said shh the neighbor came to the backyard and said to the dog out loud so all of my friends heard  you dont have to be quiet honey   Im not sure if they know thats an air bnb home  but I just wanted to let you know about that  since I thought it was rude and not necessary  I really appreciate how beautiful and clean the home was  and thank you so much for the breakfast foods  You were lovely and made for a great night with my friends  THANK YOU    The neighbor in the house next has a huge dog that never stops barking  you cant use the backyard without the dog going crazy  without stopping  and unfortunately in the morning the dog woke all of us up with non stop barking  That was a big downfall but the house was beautiful  she made sure it was spotless and provided breakfast foods  I really enjoyed staying in this beautiful home  just truly wish it was quieter

I found this place to be tidy  clean  and comfortable  It was perfect for my weekend away from kids  appreciated that it was quiet  yet near everything I needed to be without a car for the weekend too  Please be sure that your house cleaners keep check the bathroom window is securely closed after leaving  The window was left open in the bathroom so there were a lot of gnats mosquito types initially  but that was cleared up once it was closed  I look forward to visiting again

Weve stayed in this apartment twice and would definitely book it again  Great building  quiet  beautiful location  The unit could stand more  and nicer  towels  as well as the pillows replaced  They were really flat  which is odd when the duvets are so nice  A coffee maker would also be a good addition  Otherwise  great place for our trips to Chicago several times a year  Love this building and plan to stay again  but the apartment needs a few items replaced  Doorperson didnt initially swipe us in to check in until we knocked repeatedly on glass  Nicer home comforts
Great third floor apartment  Was there overnight heading back to Denver  Comfortable bed and kitchen  Thank you

The location was great  safe   and a clean unit   The only issue was the fruit flies everywhere but we managed to make the best of it  Issues with the fruit flies

basically saying I should have manage working with a broken shower on my own  For the price that their charging per night  it seems well within reason to expect a working shower and to be at least treated with a grain of care  Truly a disappointing experience  This experience was very unfortunate  Working in hospitality myself  from start to finish I did not feel like my comfort as a customer was placed at the forefront  I waited in the pouring rain after reaching out once I booked for check in details since it was passed  pm  The response came in about       mins later which generally I wish I could say I enjoyed my stay   Lets start with the good  The location is awesome   Just a short uber or even walk from downtown  and there are bike rentals   mins away so I rented a bike and biked to the museums and around Chicago  There is also a great Thai place STEPS from the building   Bed   The bed was quite comfy  like other reviewers say   Price   Obviously this is a cheaper listing in the area  so thats nice   Now for the bad      First off  walking in to this airbnb is like walking into a pre owned vehicle owned by a smoker    Maybe no one had recently smoked in there  but the whole place had a horrible smokey odor  Ironically there were TWO no smoking signs in the space      Second  there were multiple areas in the bathroom and kitchen that had not been cleaned for some time  Huge buildup of dust and dirt etc in the corners of the room  baseboards and cracks in the stove had food in them  These things made me question how well cleaned the rest of the space was   Third  the tub   shower had very little water pressure and took a long time to get hot  and every time you shower the drain backs up after about   mins of running the water  so you have to stand with your feet in disgusting shower drain back flow while you try to clean yourself    Finally  the bedroom also had top sheet   Only a duvet  Since most of the time a duvet doesnt get washed every guest  this was an additional gross factor    Last  you should know that street cleaners and construction vehicles of various kinds might wake you up in the morning  This might be seasonal  but while I was there at about  am every morning there was some kind of beeping construction or city vehicle that slowly drove by the building  Because the AC unit is in the window  it lets all the sound in    Oh and one more thing   Host says there is street parking in the listing  I attempted to park on the street and wound up with a     ticket  Clearly I missed a sign somewhere and so this is not the hosts fault  but I wouldnt stay here if you intend on having a car  There were multiple areas in the bathroom and kitchen that had not been cleaned for some time  Corners of the room  baseboards  cracks in the stove had food in them etc  These things made me question how well cleaned the rest of the space was  In addition  the tub   shower backed up after about   mins of running the water  meaning you had to stand with your feet in disgusting back flow while you showered  The bedroom also had no top sheet   Only a duvet  Since most of the time the duvet doesnt get washed every guest  this was an additional gross factor  I couldnt enjoy my stay because the whole place smelt like cigarettes and felt dirty  The price was good  but it needed to be clean and smell decent

This apartment is great for larger groups  lots of space and beds  Its also very easy to find and get into  My main complaint is that it was not very clean  There was hair all over the bathrooms and bedrooms when we got there  Brian however was very quick to respond to me and made sure I knew if he was going to be unable to respond for a little bit  Great host  great space but just needs a deep clean  Hi Brian Im not sure if youre aware but the apartment was quite dirty when we got there  There was hair all over the bathroom and dried chunks of something on the bedspread  The floor was also covered in dirt and very obviously had not been mopped in quite some time since my socks turned black after walking on it  I know you were in London so you didnt see the place after it had been cleaned but it didnt seem like it had been cleaned hardly at all  You may want to reconsider your housekeeper  It was very dirty and there was nothing stocked in the apartment at all aside from a few pieces of silverware

The place is great for large groups  the space is very roomy and open to not feel on top of each other  But sadly the place wasnt very clean as they had a large group trash it before us  there was only   towels for    people for two nights  We had to make a target run for towels and rags  Overall great location  great parking  and could be a great space and value with a few fixes  Also if you love Italian food  we highly recommend Piazza Bella its walking distance  For the value I would have that place deeped cleaned  touch up  the paint  some of the doors dont close  the lack of towels and rags for the amount it sleeps each nights is very low  and inconvenient  I understand you had people trash it before us but thats not our problem  Arrived at check in time at   and the cleaning was still cleaning until      pm If it was cleaned  had proper amount of towels and rags for the amount it sleeps each night that would be great  Instead we had to purchase some

The    Penn units are luxurious and with a great location towards the Plaza   walking distance   It has a lot of amenities but I was only able to use the gym due to COVID    even though  all the amenities are open   They assign you a private parking so you dont have to leave your car outside   I found the apartments are in a safe zone and the building has personnel checking out people that comes in  At my arrival to the apartment  I noticed the COVID    cleaning protocol wasnt employed   Under the couch there was a takeout sushi lid  the bathroom had hair residues in the cabinet and towel closet   I had to take care of the cleaning myself  The apartments are great  the problem is the Zencity Co  as the hosting entity  I had an accident at my unit and first it was a challenge to communicate with Zencity and when they did communicate  they tried to relocate me to a place that I previously told them was unsafe    Meanwhile they where handling the damages caused to the unit by the accident  I had to move for   weeks and pay for hotel stays while they were trying to get an available unit for me    They never got the safe unit I asked and stalled the process of finding one   Because my stay was time sensitive  I had to book another Airbnb  All because I wasnt provided an alternate option or accommodation in a safe location by Zencity   Thus  I ended up having to pay for   Airbnbs and a hotel room at once because they didnt provide a timeline on the repairs or even communicating what was being done   At one point  Airbnb had to become involved in the process   It has been one of the worst experiences Ive had with an Airbnb host  In COVID    times there is a CDC  protocol on how to handle the cleaning   It wasnt followed when I arrived to the apartment  At the moment I let them know and they apologize for it  Zencity management is very difficult to reach    I had an accident at their apartment an I quickly notified them but they answered   days later when the emergency was already being dealt with   I consider that as an unprofessional behavior  If you a have little kids be sure to rent a   Bedroom apt from the same building which has a bathtub as well as shower   Having a bathtub with a shower in the property will increase the value of the apartment   Also for guests  it would be good to have a balcony with maybe   chairs and a little table to be able to admire the wonderful view you have towards the pool at night

Super cute building  great location  overall really good quality stay  It was a really lovely place  We were a bit disappointed  especially in these times that the room had not been vacuumed and there was still dirt in the shower from the person before us  Unfortunately it looked as though it had not been cleaned since the last person  There were sequins all of over the floor and dirt in the shower
Nice place  very spacious  The kitchen was a little dirty  the sink had food bits everywhere and so did the included plates and silverware  but overall very nice

My girlfriend and I stayed here for her surprise birthday trip  The unit itself was everything  the description gave  One issue I noticed was that it was not throughly cleaned  but overlooked it  With it being a basement ground level pedestrians walking pass the unit can look directly inside when the blinds are opened  The mattress also felt old and sunken in  in the middle  The major issue came the last night at approx            pm when we returned from dinner  My girlfriend being pregnant had to use the restroom as soon as we entered  While using the restroom she seen a mouse run across the laundry room floor and into the bedroom  I didnt believe her until it ran from the bedroom into a closet  We immediately went outside  attempted to call the host several times  and leave voicemails  No response    I then emailed them  which they replied pretty quick  I advised them of the situation and that we need to stay somewhere else for the final night  They were able to get us into another unit   floors up  Before that we had to take all belongings into and down the hallway  checking to make sure other mice didnt get inside our things  We finally got upstairs and I did another walk through  I noticed this unit wasnt throughly cleaned either  The light switch for the kitchen and tv outlet were wired together  So the kitchen light had to be on to watch tv  The washing machine was also broken  with a full drum of  stale water inside  I contacted the host the next day about being compensated something for having to move out so late with a pregnant girlfriend for the rodent issue  then to get upstairs to a unit with broke appliances and partially cleaned and still havent heard anything back  The cleaning woman actually came in the checkout morning promptly at    am to clean both units  I told her the situation and she seemed nonchalant as of this happened before  Zencity did inbox and advise they would fix the issue with the washing machine  But that was it  When it came to  the rodent issue it was thanks for letting us know   Im not sure if pest control came out or not I feel like the unit was cleaned for the next upcoming guest and that was it  The location was great  close to downtown  I definitely would not be staying here again though and would not be gking through Zencity  Good luck If a customer call  call them back and dont refer to inboxing especially during emergency situations  Attempted to call  but no one called back

The location is ideal if you want to walk to Country Club Plaza to enjoy the shops and restaurants  It was frustrating as the key fob to access parking did not work  It would also be nice to add bath soap for the shower
Overall I enjoyed my stay In the second guess bathroom there were flys coming out the drain

DO NOT STAY HERE  AND READ THIS REVIEW  I dont really know where to start with this review  I have never had a bad experience with any stay on AIR B B till now      First this place is filthy  I am talking dirty floors  dirty counters  Considering we are in an actual HEALTH PANDEMIC at the moment this is unacceptable  The  cleaners  and I say cleaners very loosely considering they did not Great  stylish location in the heart of Hyde Park  Would stay here again  We had a lovely time and it couldnt have been a lovely weekend  The only thing was that our FOB wasnt working so it was a bit of an inconvenience  However  the front desk staff was very responsive and helpful Our FOB wasnt working the entirety of our stay

Its a ok place to stay  We do travel a lot so we are always trying new places  The apartment I feel like it was a little overpriced for the quality of the amenities and also no window to circulate air  the building has a lot of dogs and it smells like dog urine in everywhere  But the pool is great and the gym is ok as well  I loved the people living there  they are very friendly   Zencity helped with everything I need it  but again  a little bit overpriced compared to big cities like Chicago and nys apartments  Thank you for hosting us  We enjoyed our stay a lot  but I didnt know that it didnt have windows  So the air in the house doesnt circulate   Also the internet has a very poor connection  not fusible for remote workers like us   I think they should price less for the quality of the apartament in general   But I enjoyed the pool and the gym a lot

This is not the first time this has happened  When I arrived the key pad wouldnt let me in  I attempted to contact and was unable to reach anyone or have anyone return my calls  I ended up having to get a hotel

Superb placeEXCEPT   the sheets and towels were disgusting  After sleeping one night on the bed  I crashed right after I got in   I developed a significant skin infection in the back of my head the next day    staph infection  Im a dr  trust me   I knew it must have been dirty sheets bedding  took a look after work and thats exactly what it was    Maybe the cleaning people were tired short handed   etc  this was inexcusable   I would only stay here again if they got a new cleaner cleaning company   i spent      for a damn skin infxn  Im trying not to be harsh because what Im pissdd about isnt your fault  nor could you have know  About it     I make that clear in  my review  But the towels and bedsheets were disgusting  definitely not cleaned   The house looked like it was cleaned  swept vacuumed  etc    but that couch  the bed pillows comforter sheets were never cleaned  The towels smelled repulsive  Im sure you pay good money to have it cleaned and thats why Im not blaming you directly  but I did pay        for a few nights  and all I got was a staph infection on the back of my head from using your pillows    which is painful and disgusting  probably didnt look so good during my trial run as a physician nearby     Whoever your cleaning people are should be fired immediately  I could care less that the pots and pans had dust dry water marks all over them  or even that the towels looked dirty    but Im  never going to expect anyone to not clean the sheets and comforter    when I realized I had a bacterial infection on day    before going to bed   I went back to look at the bed and pillows  There was short curly black hairs all over the place  and smelled like body odor   I was disgusted

Brians listing was adequate for our stay and worked well with   bedrooms for my group  Could use a good deep clean to be   stars  Truthfully we were disappointed with the state of the Airbnb from cleanliness to creaking floors and confusing light switches  Youve got a lot of great potential with the place  Bathroom especially had little hairs like from shaving all over the floor and baseboards  shower floor was gross and in need of a deep clean  The beds were falling apart  the floors are very creaky  and it didnt feel as luxurious as youd want your Airbnb to feel  Id recommend better towels  bed frames  and linens
Beautiful space and great location

what a great price for the location  super comfy bed and although the building and entrance are not five star that should not be a deterrent for picking this place  Excellent communication  and simple check in with specific details being very clear  what a great location to downtown for the price  super comfortable bed and close to everything  the entrance is a bit dingy but that should not be a decision making criteria if you are here for the location and value

Excellent location We sent the cancellation as much to indicate that we didnt use the  nd night   Not because we expected some form of refund   My doctor appointments were over so we headed home   Hope that wasnt confusing

This was a very comfortable stay  Would use again  When we arrived  the lockbox code didnt work  My partner was trapped outside in freezing cold struggling to contact the host who was able to tell him to use a different lockbox  I say unclear instructions because the first lockbox should have been correct  but the contingency plan should have been known ahead of time too  Dangerous in Hyde park to be stranded outside  especially at a late hour  Struggled to contact host regarding above snafu

Had a great stay in this Ukrainian village apartment   Dark Matter and Bite Cafe were relatively close on N  Western Ave and a great place to have Brunch or grab a cup of coffee   Hosts were extremely communicative and promptly answered any questions we had   Easy to grab a Lyft or Uber to any of the neighboring neighborhoods   On warmer days definitely an easy walk to Wicker Park which has a lot to offer  About a    minute walk to the Blue Line which can get you to other neighborhoods worth exploring  Thanks again for being a great host during our trip to Chicago   Really great area and pretty close to Wicker Park and easy to get a Lyft or Uber to other hoods   I would say the only thing that would make your place even better is to have coffee on the premises  The Airbnbs weve stayed in at the past normally keep it on hand  You have so many great coffee brewers there why not leave some for your visitors as an introduction  During the cold winter months  it would be a great addition if you want to have a cup before heading out  Its a little touch but can go a long way  Best  Justin   Cara Although there were great coffee places in the area and seeing how its not really easy to carry coffee on a carry on  especially during cold weather months in Chicago it would have been nice to have coffee at the place  Most Airbnbs we have stayed have coffee   Its a little thing but can go a long way
Great location  Smooth check in   check out  Thick dust noted on vent in hallway  Small stain on a couple of sheets and duvets

Overall the loft was amazing  perfect location and beautiful space  However the night that we drove in from Denver to check in to the Airbnb we followed the instructions to obtain the key and the key was not there  So late at night we had to find a hotel because we could not access our Airbnb  The host   company did not even apologize for the lack of their communication  Would love to stay in that loft again the next time Im in St  Louis but dont think I will do to the confusion and the stress that we experienced during check in  Extremely disappointed in the customer service of this company not once did we receive an apology for not having the key for us on our first night we were supposed to stay in the loft  Drove from Denver to St  Louis  in a snow storm so got in late and followed the check in Instructions and there was no key  So the first night we were suppose to stay in the loft did not happen  Very slow responses and didnt even apologize for not providing the key for us
In a pretty old building in a nice neighbourhood  The elevators can be cumbersome   they dont work unless BOTH doors are completely shut  Otherwise a pretty solid place for the price
Great place  very accommodating host
Very clean and great location

Communication was smooth and check in was easy  It was a great place for a short business trip  My biggest issue with this place is that when I got in  the heat was blasting and it wasnt easy to figure out how to turn it down  and the window in the bedroom was sealed shut  Zencity was very responsive over messages and sent someone the next day to take a look and adjust the heater  but the first night was sweltering  The sink hadnt been properly cleaned and there were little hairs  as if someone had been shaving  left around  If it had been properly cleaned and if the heating worked better

The space is much larger than youd imagine from the pictures  There are a lot of stairs but who doesnt like a good workout  Honestly didnt mind it  The location was great  THANK you for a wonderful stay Clogged shower
Great place to stay in the city

Great place  stylish apartment and a very comfortable bed  However  the heating was not working in the apartment and it was freezing the whole time inside even though the digital regulator was set to   F but I also failed to notify Zencity during my stay  The heating in the apartment did not work at all  On our arrival day there was someone in the apartment fixing the heating and said it was all set but during my three days there it was freezing in the apt
Very clean and relaxed  super perfect for long long layovers  Thank you  it was perfect

Great location for the price  Our rides to comedy and shedd were about     each  There is a great little restaurant for breakfast nearby called Janiks  great service and food  Street parking was easy  We loved our stay and would recommend this apartment  Well appointed and great space to relax  We loved our time at your place  It was nice to be able to walk to local restaurants  Parking was easy and the location is great for the price  Loved that there was a french press and kettle  The fresh flowers were a nice touch as well  May I suggest a replacement of the slats that were broken in the bed support across from the bathroom  I had to lift the mattress to try and fix it and saw that there were some missing and one replaced with a board not thick enough

Great place  and walkable to convention center  The lock at the next door neighbor was beeping loudly every   sec for at least   hrs  I told several people who worked there about it but nothing was ever done  It was loud enough to be heard in the apartment  which made for an uncomfortable last   nights stay  the lock system is finicky

Great location  Looks just like the pictures  The mattress is really really hot  I think its probably the mattress cover  Also the bed wasnt made   The fitted sheet wasnt pulled over the foot of the bed and sheets were tangled all night

A spacious  simple studio with awesomely high ceilings right in the middle of everything  this was a great place to stay  If you want to be connected to the touristy areas of the city and yet feel at home  this is one to save  Your guest suggested that your space could be cleaner in the following areas  bathroom  Additional comments   The bath tub is not draining well  and the overhead light is out   The overhead in the closet is also not working

The location was great  The walls to the adjoining apartment were quite thin so you could hear the neighbors who were fighting and swearing  Someone left their phone in the apartment so then they came to retrieve it and it was disturbing
We had a great stay at Chris place

Kept well cleaned  comfortable living area  Loved the view from windows and the feel of the city  I just wish there was a AC unit in the bed room because it was a little to toasty for my liking  But other then that cute small apartment I would      recommend   Hey I had a great stay one thing I might suggest is getting a fan or something in the bedroom for more airflow because it was a little warmer then my liking  Also maybe having a nicer looking shower curtain although not a necessity it would make the bathroom look a little better  Other then that I live the area and the look and comfortably of your apartment

Great location  Bars and restaurants within walking distance  easy to shop on Michigan and drop off your bags   Thanks for the stay  the location was great  Only suggestion if you have a cleaner  the bathroom could use a once over  There was hair all over the shower and floor  Thanks again   Your guest had some issues with the check in process  directions  Your guest suggested that your space could be cleaner in the following areas  shower  towels and linens  bathroom

Fantastic location  Great building  Enjoyed the game room in lobby  Area walkable  Just good to know that Washer  dryer not in room but rather in basement of building  If you need to sleep in darkness  bring eye covers as the window blinds let in light  All in all would stay there again  but would know to bring my own pillows as theirs were really uncomfortable Thank you would suggest better pillows  and blackout curtains

Very nice host  Helpful  flexible   quickly to respond  i loved staying at Chriss appartments  i stayed at   of them in the same building  because of their perfect location  very central    convenience  everything u need in a neat charming place   Also   Chris provides a few snacks in the kitchen      Highly recommended
Elevator and doors didnt work at first  but once everything was fixed it was a great place and great trip  Thank you for everything  Control system was down

Nice quiet home with charm and nice upgrades   Good beds   Centrally located and good TV and WiFi access   Would book again but would bring your own food and supplies I have already thanked Slawik and gave recommendations for amenities   I forgot to say the shower rod was not secure and fell down on two guests   Also used and expired food in fridge

Chris apartment was perfect for a weekend visit to Chicago  Amazing location and the apartment was very spacious and clean  Chris was very responsive leading up to my visit and answered any questions I had  I would stay here again for sure

The apartment is spacious and clean and in a great location  other than the actual building entry and stairs to the apartment  which are really derelict  We enjoyed our stay and found Chris to be responsive during the booking process  There is essentially no natural light in the kitchen and living area  the bedroom has plenty  so if youll be hanging out in the apartment at all during the day  it feels somewhat cavelike  We were happy there and would recommend it nonetheless

Great location in Hyde Park right by the Lake   mi from the Loop  Clean and utilitarian  Downside is the high cost       a night for two nights  noisy a c  only one key set which requires going down   floors to let in partner  There were no WiFi or other instructions  had to email mgr  The Zencity company rep was reasonable enough for someone with no direct connection to the space  hes a good manager for an expensive crypto hotel chain with fairly crappy service   Note that this form doesnt allow for subtleties like noisy a c no WiFi instructions  not no a c or WiFi per se   The Zencity company rep was reasonable enough for someone with no direct connection to the space  hes a good manager for a crypto hotel chain with fairly crappy service      a night for a     sq ft studio with a noisy air conditioner  no WiFi or other instructions  no reserved parking and no bulb in the floor lamp bespeaks an out of touch ripoff corporation using airbnb as a front

Everything was great  Only issue was the water heater tank stopped working and it took   days to replace it so we didnt had hot water  We had an issue with the water heater tank and took   days to sorted it out

I do not want this post to come off as negative because i would stay at Chriss place again but i know that some people might have been disappointed  Lets start with the positives    Chris did a great job communicating and the place was very clean just like the photos      I felt safe however i know my parents would have felt nervous  The building is suppose to be secure but the back gate leading to the door was open half of the time because of the garbage trucks and businesss located on the first level of the apartment  The door leading up to the apartment was also propped open most of the time with garbage from the business below  The only view is of the dumpsters in the alley and the fire escape    The Kitchen could use some help  It is full stocked with dishes  but only   pots total  Only one burner on the stove top works and the oven dishwasher do not work either  So really the kitchen can be used for the full size fridge for your leftovers    Again i hate sounding so negative when i really did like this place i just know there are some up tight people i would not suggest this place to  it was really nice being so close to the red line and being able to easily navigate to all of Chicagos major attractions downtown   There isnt anything the host can do to add value  When i was comparing the place to hotels it comes pretty close in price however his building is not very secure  The only thing that i could tell some people would have an issue with is the entrance to the apt is through the back near all the dumpsters  I saw several very large rats the first night coming to the apartment  Also your view is of the dumpsters or the building and fire escape

I liked the location  It around a ton of places to eat and shop  Apartment clean but not much for sound proof  You can hear neighbors above you  talking in the halls and when they come in and out as well throughout all hours of the night

Great experience  my only qualm was the check in as there was no key present but it was resolved  The place is a regular city studio which is a little bigger than I had imagined  It was really really clean in a cool trendy neighborhood of Gold Coast  Had everything I needed for my night  AppleTV  WiFi  everything you have in a hotel   Word of advice if you are driving  parking may not be the best as there is no free parking    day parking enforced from  am   pm and yes I got a ticket   Overall a great time at this studio and literally two blocks from the CTA Red line and shops  restaurants  Starbucks and the Farmers Market on Saturdays
This is a clean and comfortable studio  Easy to catch a bus downtown  Plenty of food coffee in the neighborhood
Very clean  more space than I expected  quiet  relaxing  close to good restaurants  Only bad was the parking  It was raining so it really sucked walking so far to get to the car

Great location  Great location and exactly what it was advertised to be on the site  Had trouble using the keypad entry  Instructions should have stated to put your finger on the black glass until it lights up  Host did not respond to a call about it  Some mold on bathroom window

Big apartment with good amenities  Flatscreen TV comes with Netflix  Amazon prime   Sling which is great  A bunch of food within walking distance  Only downside is that the old fashion heaters dont work to well  Thanks for having me
The host had great communication before  during  and after our stay  The location was perfect for our trip to Chicago  Thanks again

Clean and comfy apartment  Nice location with walkable distance to any restaurants or shops or the public transportation  Just have some troubles when accessing the building  but Zencity did follow up and resolve the problem  Nice stay overall  unable to access the building

The location of this apartment cant be beat  You can walk easily to Lincoln Park  We loved touring the Lincoln Park Zoo and walking to the lake  The neighborhood is wonderful  restaurants  coffee shops and fun  unique shopping  Very safe and walkable  We were able to walk to Old Town for nightlife of even more restaurants and Second City   The apartment is basic  yet comfortable and spacious  It was a bonus having a second half bath  The building is older and you should be comfortable with this style  The value is excellent given the incredible location  having two bedrooms and plenty of space   ZenCity is very responsive and checks in to make sure all is well  Check in process was smooth  If you want an upscale location at a reasonable price  hard to find in Chicago   this is the apartment for you  fantastic location  Easy  check in good communication  suggest more cleaning in bathroom

Zencity was a great host  I would definitely stay in one of their properties again  We encountered an issue during our stay  but their staff responded quickly to rectify it  This review is in reference to the original booking at      S Blackstone  It was clean on the surface but not when you looked closely  Ex  There were food wrappers crumbs under the bed  The kitchen table had not been moved when the floor was mopped  there was sticky pink juice under the table base  The issue with cockroaches is clearly a problem with the building  but you could do a better job of sealing up the spaces within the unit so they cant come in  After the cockroach issue  I really appreciate you being accommodating and providing an alternative building for the remainder of our stay  If we did not encounter cockroaches during our stay
As we expected no surprises A little cheaper

Perfect place to stay Easy to get to and get around  Rooms are larger then expected which helped living out of suitcases   Would definitely come back and stay Only thing was one bedroom had a couple little pills  Not sure if pain related or illegal but didnt look that great and the couch seemed to be cleaned very recent to our arrival and could smell maybe spew or something that was caused to the couch maybe   But the smell did clear out a couple days later   Location great  Rooms big and spacious   Would come back

We had a fantastic stay in Chicago  the apartment was in a brilliant location  only a block away from magnificant mile  The apartment was spacious  the bed was very comfortable and the overall level of cleanliness was ok  Unfortunately the internet wasnt working on arrival which was frustrating as we had to wait until the next day to find WiFi whilst out to report the problem  but Collin sorted this problem very quickly once reported and we had internet by the second evening  There was scaffolding on the outside of the building  but we were never disturbed by any work  Whilst there was typical city noise into the evening  as the bedroom is set back from the street we were not disturbed  Overall an enjoyable stay all round  Thanks Would be handy for keys to be marked so dont have to guess every time entering building  Perhaps a collection of leaflets about points of interest in the city could help too  Bed sheet had few holes in it so could do with replacing

This unit is definitely convenient  Very economical for the traveler with an itinerary that just needs a place to sleep and wash up between busy days  The furnishings are simple so make sure to bring your creature comforts if you need any  Collin is responsive  friendly and helpful
Great location  but a bit noisey with proximity to W Ohio St and situated between   alleys  Apartment was very clean

This apartment is in a great location   walking distance to local restaurants bars and a short Uber Lyft cab ride from West Loop Michigan Ave attractions  We were able to enjoy both the local neighborhood and downtown Chicago during our stay  The Zencity team makes check in out seamless and has very quick response times to any messages  Two bedrooms make it a great spot for two couples or a family with children  Overall great stay  Good location  comfortable space  quick response times and easy check in out  My only note is that I wish the place would have felt cleaner upon arrival  The sheets and bathroom did not look like they had been fully cleaned after the guest prior to our stay  I was able to get in touch with the host and they ensured me it had been cleaned  so may have been an issue with the cleaning service they used

My husband and I spent the weekend in Chicago and really enjoyed the location of Collins apartment  We searched for a place and decided to book This apartment simply based on price and location  The apartment is located   blocks from Michigan Ave in the Magnificent Mile and   block from the Red Line train  It was extremely convenient for us since we took the train everywhere  Starbucks is also close by   The apartment is located on the second floor  Given that theres a nail salon  sandwich shop and Mexican restaurant on the first floor you cant hear or smell very much from the apartment  The apartment is clean and the bed was comfortable    Collin is extremely responsive and provided us with a lot of recommendations for restaurants and things to do    Keep in mind that this is an apartment and there are many neighbors  next door from all sides and above   Although you cant hear the noise from downstairs the walls are very thin   if you catch my drift    However  this wouldnt stop me from staying at Collins place again  Thank you for your hospitality

I would definitely look elsewhere for an Airbnb because the value isnt here on this one  I paid      a night for the unit and it was misleading  The pictures make it seem like its so much more than what it actually is  For      a night youll be able to find a way better unit in the same area  Hey Chris  Im sorry but I cant leave a   star review  The Airbnb was a bit misleading and the price was outrageous for the area  I was confused by the price when I booked and had thought the entire thing was supposed to cost half of what it did       a night in that small   bedroom apartment is insane  I looked around to see if other Airbnbs or hotels even came close to that price and they didnt  The pictures of the unit are also a bit misleading and lead you to think that the unit is actually a lot larger than it really is  I would like some portion of my money back  For the price you definitely need to look elsewhere  This is a tiny   bedroom apartment right next to a few elementary schools  The pictures make this unit seem bigger than what it actually is  Parking is a nightmare as well
Good  Carpet is needs to be replaced  Everything else was spotless  Too expensive for long term  The zencity chat support was not overly helpful

Ive stayed at a few Zencity places and have always been impressed by the cleanliness and decor of their spaces  However  I would not stay at this location again  It was much smaller than anticipated  which was not really a big deal   since it was just me and my boyfriend staying there  However  the place was not as clean as we expected  The living room was dusty and the rug needed to be vacuumed badly  Also  the shower curtain liner in the bathroom had someone elses hair on the bottom of it  Ive never had these issues with any of their other locations so it sucked to have to deal with it here  Other than that  the place was fine  Hello   Some of the suggestions have would be to dust thoroughly  The living room was pretty dusty and the rug needed a good vacuum  Also  the bathroom needed to be cleaned more thoroughly as well  The shower liner had someones hair on the bottom of it

great location   close to public transportation  neighbors were loud and apartment walls were thin  water pressure in the showers was awful  overall good value compared to other locations  there was some mold in the shower the water pressure in both showers was awful
