Fab spacious apartment  clean and comfy with good kitchen  Responsive host  Hi Chris  The apartment is really lovely and clean  As this was a work trip the WiFi issue was quite a serious problem for me   the Xfinity solution didnt really work  Thank you for trying though   I dont know if it should but the vent in the kitchen makes a lot of noise  though once used to it it wasnt a problem  The graffiti that can be seen through the paint on one of the rooms was a little intimidating  odd to someone new to a city   The beds were super comfy   lovely clean linen  Problem with building key  it was almost impossible to use  had to use back up one in the end  Was worried would get locked out  Sometimes a  it delayed in responding   WiFi issue not really resolved
This place was a lot smaller than expected and not worth the price

Location  location  location   We liked being five blocks from the train and Whole Foods   Having two bathrooms was an unexpected treat   Bed was wonderful  I added a note on a previous page   We enjoyed our stay and would choose to come back again   I could have given five stars if the missing coffee pot had been replaced  We communicated four times after arriving requesting the replacement of the French Press pot which was missing   Although Chris promised to drop one off  it never arrived   A coffee pot is listed as one of the amenities   I also suggest the addition of a dish drying towel  There was a dish rag  but no drying cloth

Very cute place in a nice area  Not far from public transit and quick ride to downtown  Loved the place  A couple things I would recommend are to offer water or some sort of water filter  Additionally  the bathroom door didnt close

Needed a place to stay in Chicagos Hyde Park neighborhood  unexpectedly  Was delighted to find this listing as the location was perfect   PROS  Centrally located  on a quiet block  in a great neighborhood  It is a two block walk to   rd street which has many stores and restaurants  including a Target  This listing also has an in unit washer and dryer  with detergent and bleach provided  There was a smoothie blender  coffeemaker  french press  and all the basic kitchen utensils  Salt  pepper  and cooking spray were also provided  The unit was well stocked with toliet paper  paper towels  and cleaning supplies  The space was large  uncluttered and easy to maneuver  The bed was well made  comfortable  and provided a good nights rest  The tub had Jacuzzi style jets   CONS  The listing was not as clean as one would like  There was a thick layer of dust on all the light fixtures  the fire extinguisher  and the windows  The hardwood floor  in the kitchen area  was gritty  There was a large spider in the corner of the bedroom  to the right and above  the bed  There were two large water  bugs in the shower  The tub was discolored  which made it look dirty  When a     a night listing is almost doubled in price because of a     cleaning fee  one expects things to be clean  In addition to the regular and expected displeasure from finding a rented space in this state  it was doubly bad for us because my partner has asthma  She had to go find a cafe while I cleaned the unit of dust  before she could come back in   Over all this was a nicely appointed space that would be perfect for up to   people to stay in for as long as was needed  The convenience of an in unit washer and dryer really set it apart  above  and beyond   It would be a four star listing if it had been properly cleaned and was a little less expensive  As it was  I give this unit     stars  Whomever is doing your cleaning at this location is not doing a great job  Otherwise the space was lovely and just what we needed  Your guest suggested that your space could be cleaner in the following areas  dust  shower  bugs  floors and carpet  Additional comments   There was a thick layer of dust on all the light fixtures  the fire extinguisher  and the windows  The hardwood floor in the kitchen was gritty   There were two large bugs in the shower  Also  the tub looked discolored  which made it look dirty
Nice little spot right in midtown  Very easy check in

Very nice place to stay  Hyde Park is nice area  and downtown is within reasonable drive train ride  I would make sure to stay within Hyde Park area though  apparently things can get rough around it  Apartment was nice and clean and building is very quiet  no problems at all comes to noice  Water temperature in shower was a bit inconsistent  that would be my only complaint  Thank you for providing us a place to stay  Mostly I was happy with the apartment  The water in shower was not very warm  It was not freezing either  and showering wasnt too uncomfortable  Still  I could not give a   star review due to that  We wanted to check in earlier than I originally told the historia  after the  pm check in time still   I asked If there was any problem to do that  but did not get an answer  The earlier than planned check in worked out fine  but it would have been nice to get a response  The street building is located on is very nice and quiet  I also liked Hyde Park area a lot  Apparently Hyde Park is close to some rougher areas  so its good to do some research of where not to wander  Uber and Metra were convenient ways to get to downtown Chicago

Great location and good value  Communication with the host could be confusing  and guests should note both that     a digital keypad is used for entry and    the door and keypad alarm is extremely sensitive and likely to go off  even when simply locking the deadbolt from inside  Had a tough time getting good information or responses  The check in instructions in the details page were different than those sent via message ahead of time  and my follow up questions by message and phone went unaddressed unreturned   Unit location is great  and values pretty good  but the difficult check in and communication issues overshadowed it for me

Pros   Great area  walking distance to Frank Lloyd Wrights Robie house  University of Chicago  etc  Theres ample street parking and the building is cool  Easy check in and checkout  Very responsive communications from Chris   Cons  The studio did have a really strong smell of cleaning products when we arrived  We opened all the windows and left for a couple of hours  during which time it mostly dissipated  Also  the rug under the sofa futon was wet  Turns out the problem was the AC  We discovered that it leaked when running  which soaks the floor  We reported this to Chris Zencity and he was going to check it out  so probably not an issue for future guests  Finally  the door to the bathroom was very difficult to close completely without brute force  Might be an issue if youre staying with someone you arent very close to

The place is as described and looks like the photos  Location is great  being on Milwaukee and in a bustling fun neighborhood like Wicker   The only downside is the place is still under construction and  super sketchy  For example the construction workers are scary unprofessional   yelling names  listening at the door  they knew my wife was alone in the apt  it was like they wanted her to  checkout earlier so they could work  How they even knew this info was unsettling suggests  Zencity   works with them  Otherwise I am not sure why youd be bothering a tenant guest suggesting they hurry up  leave  Something definitely not right here  I would not recommend staying because of this    Disclaimer were born and raised in Chicago  we live on the south side  this was is crazy to us

Great experience overall  Clean  well located and modern  Mattress and pillow situation could be better but OK for short stay  Great experience overall  Clean  well located and modern  However  the pillows need to be upgraded  they were all extremely thin and the mattress wasnt that comfortable

The suite had a nice vintage feel too it with a touch of modern here and there  The place was very clean and had all the amenities that is required  WiFi is very spotty though and host takes a very long time to reply  Parking is a hassle because there is no parking on premises  so you either get very lucky and get street parking or you have to park farther away and pay  The neighborhood is very nice and is conveniently close to many shops  Overall a nice place  just little things that made me not completely enjoy my stay   Hey I left a bag in the apartment and I was wondering if there is anyway I can retrieve it    Hard to find Parking

Very nice  homey  and stylish place  Really close to highway and hospital so expect alot of city noise and ambulance  We loved your place so much  It was very homey and stylish  I will check out more places in the future  Host never responded to me but I had no questions just updates Nice area and very close to the highway so lots of street noise
dont stay here lost email with instructions host never responded to a long time to in dirt on bed said there was street parking   good luck with that

We had a solid stay  Great communication about how to check in  a spacious unit with a comfortable bed and linens  and a lovely location bonus  The Hyde Park Community Art Fair turned out to be one street away  which offered up a great way to visit the neighbourhood and enjoy local street eats  Thank you for the effort you put into our stay  We really appreciated the detailed instructions for check in  the spacious layout  and a comfortable bed    We had a few issues that Ive mentioned elsewhere  that made our stay a bit below a    experience for the price  we do appreciate that it was an extra pricey weekend everywhere due to the conference   I did want to mention that considering you have lockbox entry  I felt a bit stressed having to advise exactly when wed be checking in  on top of fairly rigid timing in the first place  plus then you didnt respond back once I tried to offer multiple best answers possible  With no context response  I couldnt tell if there was an issue  or if this was just a gentle inquiry  On the whole  our experience was solid and our public review will reflect that    Best wishes   leilah While most of the space was clean  there were several stains on the couch that were pretty unappealing   and empty and non functional handsoap in both bathrooms  For a pretty expensive booking fee  a bit of flexibility with check in time  a less worn down living room  and not having to hunt down our own soap would have made this a    stay

Very close proximity to Barnes Hospital  doorman very courteous and helpful  Maybe have coffee available   When I think of B   B  there is usually coffee available and very often very simple breakfast items  Initial responses speedy but later they were more delayed  e g  had to ask them to resend final details of check in  did not respond when I had to check out   days early or acknowledgement when I checked out  Due to its proximity to a major medical establishment  am guessing many guests are hospital visitors or patients as in my care   As a result  hospital stays are dynamic   as in my case in that I pre paid   nights but due to an unexpected early hospital discharge  I only stayed one night   My stay was quite expensive for one night  Also the service charge and occupancy fees were quite a large component of the total cost which I have not experienced in other stays
We enjoyed being so close to Michigan Ave  Would stay here again
Great location  Didnt include much information about Wi fi and cable

Great location  convenient to public transit  food  nightlife  Just poor water pressure and temperature in the shower and sinks  Made it difficult to get ready there   We enjoyed the convenient location of the space and it was enough for what we needed it for  but the shower pressure was almost non existent  Also I couldnt get any hot water  so I was forced to shower at my friends apartment  Had I not known people in the city  this would have been a big problem for me  May want to have someone take a look at it  Thank you for the smooth check in and check out  just fix the water and it will be great   Found a used tissue in the window ledge    While getting the key was easy  there wa son instruction for the code to get into he door from the lobby to the stairs  Had to ask someone who lived there for it    There was very little water pressure and no hot water in the shower  Ended up showering at my friends apartment  I liked the space but not having a shower that worked well put a damper on things

Good stays with zen city  Small thermostat issue at this apartment  Im sure they will have it resolved by the next stay  Good bed pillows and great check in experience  Will stay with them again Have stayed with you all before  and like you guys  Consider this stay a one off as it was a bit subpar with thermostat issues and used washcloth  but will explore staying with you all again on my next trip to kc  Used washcloth in shower Thermostat issue

Pros   terrific location  Convenient to everything the Gold Coast has to offer   His unit is on a quiet street  Building is quiet for the most part  Chris responds to your questions in a timely manner  There is an instruction manual that helps explain everything    Cons  The unit could have been cleaner  We found old socks on the kitchen floor and next to the bed  dust on top of the refrigerator and on shelves  woodwork around doors and base boards are dirty  I found a half empty pop bottle on the window sill next to the bed  Water pressure is low  maybe it was just on our weekend  and I went to take a shower and the diverter wouldnt stay up  thus no water came up through the shower head  No showers this weekend   With a little attention to detail  this could be a   star place  Your guest suggested that your space could be cleaner in the following areas  dust  bathroom

The apartment building location is very convenient and close to a lot of great places  The entry to the apt  itself though is odd  but Chris spells it out clearly in the instructions  Stairs up to apartment are very steep   Living room furnishings  futon and eating table chairs are bare bones  not comfy  Bed was comfortable  but room was chilly because of big windows  My husband uses a CPap machine and had to put a folding chair next to bed to put it on because there are no nightstands  although plenty of space  Nothing to see out windows except brick wall and dumpsters  Chris responds quickly and supplies lots of tips and information about the area   The apartment is fine as far as a place to sleep  not hang out in  and you cant beat the convenience of the location   Thanks  Chris  We enjoyed our visit to Chicago  My only suggestion is that we couldnt find a blanket  You might want some extra bedding  My husband wanted to sleep on the futon but we couldnt find extra sheets or a blanket or anything  The bedroom was much colder than the other room   Also  people should be warned that the stairs are quite steep and not safe if you have bad knees  The location  except for the weird entrance  was convenient

Cute and cozy apartment  perfect for a couple wanting to explore the city  Central to just about everything and very convenient  Chris was very helpful and always reachable via AirBNB messenger   The apartments location couldnt have been more convenient  The place was cute  cozy and very easy to relax in  The only ongoing issue was the very loud heaters which we couldnt seem to turn off  The noise was so disturbing that it kept us from sleeping a couple of nights  The temperature was also pretty hot and hard to control maintain  We also thought that a microwave might be nice addition to the kitchen  Thank you for lending us your place

Wonderful location  great parking  Felt very secure  Thank you for everything  Great location  Love the parking  The furnishings of the unit were a little sparse  Some difficulty getting into the building
Great place to stay for a short time

Nice aesthetic  quaint space to be alone for spiritual retreat  Also  Baileys downstairs has really good shakes   Ive never tasted anything like it I liked this place so Ill probably be frequenting this stay and youll be hearing from me again soon with another booking   Ashley Security and checkin was a bit difficult because of the codes not working sometimes but it didnt hinder me from enjoying my trip because of one two mishaps
Building was under construction so there was a funny smell literally everywhere  Was clean and nice  just expected a finished building for the price Building was under construction

This is a very nice and stylish space  We loved how convenient the location was and how easy it was to get to and get into  We didnt love how much of our neighbors we could hear  music and conversations  but we stayed the night during a trip so we werent there for too long  We were a last minute stay and we appreciate being able to get us in and enjoyed the overall stay  Thank you for the stay  The location was perfect and it made a great pit stop on our journey
I was waiting for   more hours for check in

Centrally located on main strip of central west end  No designated parking but street parking on the side with meters  Wi fi was super slow the whole time  We couldnt log into Netflix because there were too many users  Check in instructions were very complicated but well laid out  The florescent lighting is abrasive in most rooms  Feels more like a hotel than an air bnb  Nice lobby  nice furnishings in the room  Good water pressure  The listing says sleeps   but only one bed available  Very pricey for the amenities available  Not many  Clean but I do not recommend  Add a wi fi server because yours was very slow  Too many people were on Netflix so we couldnt watch  we had to use our own  Please sign out of ours  Also the listing says sleeps   but there was only one bed  There is no designated parking  Try using soft white light bulbs for lamps  not as abrasive Parking  Working wifi  Netflix that worked   Food staples  Difficult instructions to check in to follow very complex  Non flourescent lights
Super cute apartment located walking distance from tons of food and entertainment  The apartment was a little messy but besides that it was excellent and definitely worth the price

The Bell Lofts is a beautiful building in a wonderful location  Stores  restaurants  attractions and even medical facilities are well within walking distance  This apartment is nice  Its very clean   Do note that the walls to the bedrooms are partial walls and do not connect to the ceiling  if youre sharing the space  dont expect any privacy     I enjoy staying at the Bell Lofts  this stay was ok  but there are certainly better ones in this building  If I were you  Id skip this one and look for a stay that is run by one or two individuals rather than a management firm  Theyll take pride in their space and make sure its outfitted with more than the cheapest furniture  Theyll care enough to answer the phone when youre unable to access the building   Still  you can certainly do worse than this loft  Its overall a nice space  Thank you for our stay  the building was clean and beautiful   Maybe Im a jerk  but does it seem unreasonable that hosts might offer some recompense for forcing someone with arthritic knees to use the stairs for a stay on the seventh floor  You probably think Im being ridiculous  but it caused significant struggle and pain for my wife   Id have appreciated any kind of gesture of good will in an attempt to try to help  Without a functional elevator  the toll on her knees was too much for us to do our planned activities for our trip  In retrospect  it would have been better to have stayed elsewhere the first night and asked for a refund  I had trouble accessing the building  there was trouble with the intercom system  Ill give extra leeway to the hosts as checkin was on Christmas Day  however it was a drag standing on the street in downtown St  Louis on Christmas Day for a while before discovering an unlocked back entrance all before receiving a response to my phone call  That might have been ok  but since the elevator wasnt working  I had to lug our suitcases up to the  th floor via the stairs

It was fun staying in this beautiful apartment  Perfect size for my boyfriend and I  The bed was comfy and the tv let us sign in to watch a movie  The only thing was being in an apartment building you cant tell what will be going on around you  It was kind of loud from nearby apartments yelling and racket that youd expect from being in the city  The price was well worth the stay  I would recommend  There was a moldy pillow in the bedroom closet that was a little bit of a put off  other than that everything was great  parking makes it kind of difficult

The location was good  The apartment is a bit worn down compared to the pictures but thats pretty standard  The kitchen was nicely stocked with everything youd need to cook with  They provided Netflix which was petty cool  We didnt have any towels when we showed up but once I asked for some they responding instantly and fixed the issue  The only pain in the bum was the no parking thing and going out to the meters every two hours was annoying but thats not their fault  but deff something to keep in mind  Overall a nice stay  I would suggest getting some roach traps for the kitchen since I saw one but it ran away before I could kill it  Other than that it was a nice stay  Thank you

Beautiful  quiet and spacious  Responsive maintenance crew  I didnt expect a refund for the bathroom issues but it would have been nice to offer something in its stead There was hair all over the shower and the toliet was slow to drain and got backed up

The kitchen amenities were helpful for basic cooking and bedroom living room were nice and comfortable  The kitchen sink only gave out hot water  the cold setting didnt work  Parking was ok  mostly a side street half of which they may ticket during business hours  Noise was good in the apartment until someone moved in above me playing loud music       but otherwise never bothered by anyone  There is construction on a new apartment complex right next door however  Laundry was ok  and could pay only with a card  Fitness center fine for basic workouts  Elevator is helpful  I couldnt ever get the deadbolt to work and towards the end of my stay the door wouldnt close latch from the inside  I had to pull hard from the outside to latch it  I just locked the handle from the outside with the key fob to lock the apartment  I let the landlord know these things after I left so they may have this fixed soon   Thank you for the stay  Towards the end of my stay the door was unable to close from the inside and I had to pull hard from the outside to latch the door  The deadbolt also never worked  The kitchen sink also only gave out hot water  it had no cold setting

Great location  great ambience and space  Needs a little cleaning and doors secured but overall we loved our stay  Im from STL and I love the new lofts  The bathroom and laundry room floors were dirty from construction and someone walking on them with wet feet and there was a lot of trash in the building  Not just construction trash but trash from the homes too  The door and windows were also open upon arrival  The second day the place smelled like weed as well  The space was great and we enjoyed our stay  I wouldve given a five if the place was secured and clean upon arrival  I will definitely stay again

Great location  very quiet given busy neighborhood   Parking less complicated than expected    free parking on street from     pm until early am if you could catch a spot  which we did two nights in a row   Bed super comfortable     Apple chargers all over the place much appreciated  Might want to fix the front door handle    quite loose   The dishwasher almost didnt work   Would have washed dishes by hand  instead of trying to use the dishwasher but no towels to dry with   Nothing a huge deal   All fine but not great  Kitchen garbage was totally full with some nasty stuff    obviously missed by the cleaning crew from the previous guests   Hairs of numerous kinds in bathroom   I used to clean homes in a previous life  so Im picky about such things  I tried asking questions about parking  it was a pretty big concern   I also love my coffee in the morning and asked if any coffee was in the property   I either missed their reply  or didnt get one   I think the latter  but room for error on m part
Nice stay  Please provide more towels  wash cloths and linens Good value  But the owner charged me for pillow cases and duvet that I accidentally spilled medicine on  However  it was washable

Great clean place  great location  Just was looking for a little more amenities  body wash  shampoo  etc    Check in time was confusing  Air bnb asked and confirmed a check in time but the check in time on Zencitys end was not the same  Overall a really good stay  Provide a little more amenities  Standard body wash  etc

Our family of    including   grandchildren had plenty of room in this double unit  It was easy to get to Wrigley and other Chicago sites  Thanks  Brian  Add the few amenities I already suggested  but its a great place

The location was great  There were many restaurants in walking distance  The building was filthy upon walking in  There was sticky floors as something large was spilled everywhere leading to the elevator and the elevator smelled of pee and beer  They ended up mopping up late into my second day of the stay but still wasnt spotless  Bathroom wasnt the cleanest  But the rest of the suite was charming and well decorated  Bed and sheets were clean and comfy  There was apparently a leak above the unit and two days we had visitors from the building to inspect  Not hosts fault  Could have been better for the price

Property is as shown in the pictures  very nice  The balcony was pleasant to sit and relax on  Great location  short walk to the Plaza area   The on site gated parking is excellent  Also you are minutes from all major attractions  Bring your own soap and shampoo for bathroom as none are provided  The only I had was the noise  You can hear extremely loud footsteps from the unit above  I mean really loud  and the unit on the same floor next to this unit  Shouting from someone upstairs one evening  and their washer dryer you can hear  This was almost constant for my entire stay except for when the people were gone or sleeping  If you are bothered by this I would suggest looking elsewhere or bringing earplugs  headphones  Otherwise great stay  Long black hairs  kitchen counter  bathroom floor  shower stall No response to a message I sent on Saturday the  th

Nice neighborhood  good transport  easy parking on the street  The building is safe with helpful staff  You should solve the lack of responsibility in case of any problem with the room  I think it is not acceptable that you rent the room in a building and dont take the responsibility for and the building either  You two should make it clear  Other than that  this is a good place  we were satisfied  Thank you  When a sudden problem came out  they replied to my email but misunderstood and did not solve the problem  I had to figure out a phone number of the company in the middle of the night  Made some phone calls without moving forward and if I hadnt been that distinct  they would not have found the solution

I checked ahead of time to make sure a later arrival would be ok  I was told there would be no problem  I got into rental property place at roughly  AM and was told by the staff I was not on the list of guests by Zencity to be staying in the apartment for the night  I showed them my airbnb reservation along with my receipt of payment  The rental property staff tried contacting Zencity where they said they were being answered and then told they would get back into contact with them before getting hung up  It took until  AM for them to get back into contact to let the rental property know that I was approved  I had a meeting this morning in Chicago that I only got   hours of sleep for  I leave Chicago Saturday morning and now my trip is ruined because I am exhausted from last night  I had paid for a service that was not met  I had planned and notified them of a late arrival and was told it would be ok  I would have otherwise made arrangements to get into town earlier had I been notified it would not be ok  It was frustrating being told by the rental property that we would most likely not be allowed to stay the night and having to figure out other arrangements  Asked for a refund that they said they would grant over the phone  however didnt hold up to their word  Escalated to airbnb  Carpeting was poorly vacuumed

This place is great  everything is accurate  Lots of space for   people and the front desk staff are the best  Th The place was great  our favourite part about our stay was the staff at the front desk  WE LOVED THEM  The bathroom shower curtains were moldy  floors were dusty  hair all over washroom  the living room floors were dusty and the bedroom blankets  sheets and pillows were covered in stains

My fianc  and I had multiple issues with this Airbnb  First off  upon arriving I was told per my itinerary that the keys to the apartment would be with the doorman at the entrance to the building  Which was not the case   the doorman could not locate the keys and seemed to act like he had no idea what I was talking about  I was also told not to mention anything about Airbnb and instead say that I am staying in a corporate rental  Not sure why the secrecy is necessary but if there is some type of stipulation with the apartment building that bans Airbnb hosts from renting units out you probably shouldnt put your paying customers in the middle of that dont you think  Anyway  He ended up calling a maintenance worker to let us into the apartment after he verified my identification  Upon being let into the apartment at      pm  Airbnb host was not flexible whatsoever about check in time even though he knew it would result in us being basically stranded with nowhere to put our luggage for several hours  the room was occupied with several people whom Im assuming were cleaning the apartment although there was quite the language barrier between us  They informed us the Airbnb   that I already paid hundreds of dollars for for LESS THAN a    hour stay  was NOT ready for us yet and to come back later   mind you our check in itinerary told us  pm and it was well passed  pm by this point  So we had to leave our luggage  which my fianc  didnt know at the time contained an extremely expensive engagement ring  with   complete strangers in an apartment that we still did NOT have keys to for another hour  Which as you can imagine was not a comfortable or secure feeling  When we finally returned the cleaning lady was STILL there and I basically had to ask her to leave  We both have been traveling since   am that morning and were exhausted and had dinner reservations  that we ended up missing because we couldnt get ready in time due to our late check in  to get ready for  Also  the floors surrounding the apartment are currently under construction so expect ALOT of very  disruptive noises throughout the wee hours of the morning  At times it sounded like someone was going to basically come through the ceiling  Not happy whatsoever and will not be booking with zen city again  I hope you guys do better

The unit is in a great location with restaurants bars easily accessible in this safe and clean neighborhood  The hosts were very prompt in their communication  The TV is loaded with popular streaming services and the kitchen is well setup  One downside was the shower had barely any water pressure and the tub didnt drain very well which made showering very difficult  Hey guys  there seems to be an issue with the shower and tub that seems to have been reported by an earlier user as well  The shower barely has any water pressure  some previous guest had mentioned this in the reviews  and the tub doesnt drain  The second thing was the bed sheets had stains on them and there was a hair stuck on the photo frame above the bed  With that said  the place itself is well laid out and the location is great  Overall we were fine for the short stay but fixing the shower and bedsheets issue would go a long way for future guests  Bed sheets had stains  Bathroom tub didnt drain and the shower water pressure was barely functional

Great location  responsive host  a bit pricey  Looked good  neat  floor and counters were not really dirty but not clean either  Choice of blanket vs comforter  ability to adjust room temp  no thermostat  too cold to leave window open   lower total cost  At      it was overpriced   Still worth it if you want walking distance to lake and town  but less comfort than a hotel room for nearly same cost

Thanks Beds dirty with hair and debris  Hall way up to unit smelled extremely terrible and was filthy  Unit smelled bad  Had to leave property and get an alternative room due to unsanitary property  Requested a refund and took days to get a response which was ultimately denied  Near alot of bars and restaurants  Over a run down cleaners  Property is owned by zencity and they really dropped the ball on this one  I would advise against staying at any of their properties  A refund in my option was fair since I left the property and never returned  Their communication was slow and poor customer service  Airbnb was no help  They have no standards for customer service in these instances so dont waste your time and money with this pair

This place gets two stars    for location and   for responsiveness of the host  We rented for a month long stay and we paid a lot of money for it  The laundry list of damaged furniture and the filth of the place was offensive  We had to have a handy man in twice to properly fix broken furniture and appliances and to scrub scum and dirt from the bathroom tiles  The couch had to be steam cleaned it was so filthy and smelly  We had to request mattress covers because the mattresses were stained and had pubic hair on them  This is definitely a place for parties and not for long terms stays  I corresponded frequently with the host and while super responsive to get issues addressed which was appreciated  a discount reflecting the extend of the disruption would have been even more appreciated  I unfortunately cannot recommend this unit  I appreciate the responsive customer service  However as I communicated early in the stay the cleanliness issues were insulting to the price we paid  Equally the resistance to offering an appropriate discount for the disruption we experienced was disappointing

Nice clean roomy one bedroom in great location in Hyde Park and with a  view of Lake Michigan  The couch could be more comfortable but the bed was great  I recommend this place  Hi  I loved the location and nice clean apartment and roomy  Only negatives were that the couch is not comfortable   low and squishy  it is different I think than the one pictured  And the second thing may be related to the building  and that is very low shower stream and pressure  Takes a long time to rinse hair   Regarding communication  when I first looked at it before actual booking I asked some questions that were never answered  I only got auto responses unlike the prior host in Bucktown where I was for   weeks  that answered everything within hours     Overall a very good stay  just wanted you to know the above comments  Thank you

This apartment was a cute place to stay  We wished we were a bit closer to the metro  but that wasnt a huge deal  I loved that the kitchen was fully equipped that allowed us to eat in  I was also very grateful there was laundry because my face wash leaked all over my suitcase   I was able to throw clothes in with no worries  The people living staying above us were a bit loud  We could hear their conversations and them walking running around later in the night  Overall  the stay was very nice  The only reason I did the   stars was because of the check in and the loud neighbors  since it was advertised as a quieter place   It was also pretty cold in certain areas of the apartment as well but we did appreciate the extra blankets in the closets  The check in instructions were not clear until I had to reach out when we got there of course I could have planned that better as well  I did specifically look in the Lincoln Park area per suggestion from a friend but I think we would have been better off closer to downtown or closer to the metro

I have never arrived in such a filthy apartment  Long black hair everywhere  grease splatter on the upper cabinets  and dust on baseboards  Marty offered to have the space cleaned again  but I did not want anyone in the apartment  I deep cleaned the apartment myself and requested more cleaning supplies and extra toilet paper be left outside of my door  it took   days to get my supplies which were placed inside of the apartment  After cleaning supplies were placed inside the apartment  I was locked out for an hour by the electronic lock  The apartment has damaged drywall and requires repair and painting  It appeared that a long term tenant vacated   and this was the first Airbnb hosting  The apartment is a great space in a great location  I have hosted my own Airbnb apartments and always gave my guests an elevated experience  Marty always did his best to resolve any issues  and I think the next guest will have a better experience after the above issues are resolved  Get your act together

Convenient  well located  rapid responses  Wifi is a bit slow though  I appreciate the quick responses  location and the ease to check in and out  My only issue was the slow internet connection that only slightly improved after the reboot

was unsatisfied with this stay i had     hello when i was about to cook i noticed that there was a dirty towel hanging from the stove like somebody used it to clean up then hung it back up  the toilet seat had brown stuff on it even when u lift the seat up    i clean for a living and the place was not cleaned properly     thanks wasnt told i had to use a specific door to enter the instructions said use the side door when i went in the restroom the shower was not cleaned or the toilet i had to clean it before i used it     in the kitchen there was a dirty towel hanging from the stove

TERRIBLE customer support   Its a shame that this place was so cute  I just wasnt able to get into the building  The access code they gave me was wrong  the key fob to get into the building and use the elevators was not working and on top of that Zencity did NOTHING to help  Residents had to keep letting me into the building  when contacting the host they saw that as a resolution  It was New Years Eve with Covid and not a lot of foot traffic  My boyfriend and I were stuck at the entrance for over    minutes waiting for a resident to come home  I had book this place for one night  and had way to much trouble to pay       This was a complete rip off and Im VERY disappointed on how the host has handled my situation and lack of communication  Pick wick place apartments should no longer do business with this company because they have such a nice apartment building  that I would have loved to stay there again  but most definitely WILL NOT  I am VERY displeased with the way your company handled my situation  We were locked out of the building and was told that nothing was wrong  The access code to get into the building was wrong  and our key fob was not working  When trying to get in touch with support  it was difficult  Then when trying to resolve the situation  it was even more difficult  No one actually resolved my error with the access code  or my non working fob  Residents had to keep letting me in and Zencity kept seeing that as a resolution  Couldnt get in contact when I was locked out of the building

Brians place has a lot of potential  but there are still a few kinks to work out  The beds are very comfortable and the location was great for getting a quick Lyft ride  Brian is an excellent communicator and did all he could to help us with a few issues we had  Brian  your place has great potential  but definitely some details to work out to match the level we are used to with AirBnb  For example  there is a ton of dirt under the sink in the front bathroom  It looks like construction dirt that is still there  There is no where at all to put your toiletries so that space is needed and it was pretty gross  Both bathrooms had a lot of hair and dust around the baseboards and the corners    We would highly recommend some boot racks  rugs  towels by the entrance  It was impossible to keep that area dry with nothing  Weather in Chicago will require those most of the year    More towels would also be really great  We had one large towel each and no personal hand towels or any washcloths    Last  just a reminder that the couch is broken  so we had barely anywhere to sit  We left the broken stool in the closest so no one would fall and get hurt  Your guest suggested that your space could be cleaner in the following areas  bathroom  dust

This house is super cute and a good value  I stayed by myself but it would be great for a bit larger groups  Hosts went above and beyond to return some left behind articles while I was still in town  and I appreciate that kind of hospitality  I did enjoy my stay there and appreciated the extra hospitality in returning my electronics  That was very kind  My notes on the kitchen are for improvements  One other thing that would have been great is if porch lights could have been left on since i made it clear I would be in later after dark  Was really hard to know which house was the right one and I had to call Slavik  who was asleep on the other side of the earth  LOL  Overall I would recommend to others  the house is really cute and has some nice features  Trash can swinging lid was quite dirty  refrigerator door handle dirty  coffee pot had old grounds and coffee in it  Kitchen floor also needed swept  I felt like it should be listed as North Hyde Park  not central

The apartment building had very bad cellular reception  I also found a huge roach which I had to kill  I also found mouse droppings in the bed  When I asked the property manager about refunding the cleaning fee they pretty much ignored my request   only refunded the days left on my reservation due to me requesting to leave early  I appreciate being allowed to shorten my reservation however I dont think its fair that a cleaning fee was charged to me due to the amount of sanitary issues I came across  I also had to use my own bug spray in the unit to make myself feel comfortable while there  We found a massive roach in our unit as well as mouse droppings in the bed When I asked for a refund for the cleaning fee I was ignored The apartment unit has horrible cellular reception  I had to leave in order to have a full phone conversation

This is a lovely restored very old home   Nice and easy to deal with owners  Fairly good location if youre going to sporting events  and outdoor concerts  We did enjoy the stay and the home was very clean and nice old style appearance  Location of home was pretty convenient to the venues of the events we were going to  Friendly attitude of home owner  The only negatives were the showers  A little hard on us to shower in the claw tub with such limited space  We found it to be a little uncomfortable  And would have been nice to have had regular tv programs on the tv and maybe at least one regular tv upstairs  We found several places to grab a meal without having to drive too far  But would have been nice if there were a few nice fast food places real close to house that were in desirable neighborhoods  All in all we enjoyed our trip  Thanks for working with us as we had one person arrive separately and a little before official check in time  Had hoped it was a little closer to some quality restaurants and maybe some fast food places that were real close and in a desirable area

The lodging is a secure building in Hyde Park great for shorter visits to Chicago  The view was lovely and its within close distance to the lake  The building staff are also very accommodating  If you like to cook or use the kitchen Id recommend bringing your own tools since the ones provided are worn or arentprovided  The building has good and safe street parking for free and close to a train stop  Good for young adults and couples wanting to visit the city  Id recommend adding some more cooking supplies and replacing the one medium sized pan because its difficult it cook with  The walls were a bit dirty as well not sure why  Communication was good between us however and the Thai restaurant was very good thank you for the recommendation  Not enough adequate cooking supplies to make food easily

great location but no parking on site    there were two spots on spothero within   blocks  but nothing directly on the street after December   for overnight parking   during the day was easy       hr    they were quick to respond via messaging to issues  but the handyman was rude and failed to show up multiple times when promised     days without stove microwave and needing to be moved to another property for   nights is not a big deal   but with two kids during the winter and paying  k for   weeks     yeah  its kind of a big deal       new dishwasher and washer dryer were nice   space looks freshly remodeled  but the furniture looks second hand or worn     wobbely desk and one of the dining room chairs was so bad it wasnt usable     bowls for a  br apartment    one of the widows literally fell out onto the bed our child normally slept on   i guess it wasnt locked in place when we arrived and i never checked   could have been really bad had  somebody been in that bed  sent through text already  issues put aside  it would have been good value   however  too much went wrong for the amount we paid to give five stars

This was the worst AirBnB experiences Ive had  I drove    hours and arrived at the AirBnB at    pm  It was self check in  and the code to get the key didnt work  I contacted the host who then self released the key box  No key inside  We try   other boxes and the key was not there  She said the cleaner did not return the key to the box and to go up to the unit to see if it was unlocked  When I went in the tv was on  furniture moved around and the bed un made w make up on the sheets  She had me drive to another unit in town   which had unclear instructions on how to arrive  I ended up not inside until      am  It was not the ladys fault who helped me  I asked for    extra minutes for check out and another person told me it was impossible for them to allow that and I needed to leave by the time they said  They ignored my message when I asked why no one had rectified or even attempted to rectify any of these issues  Strongly would not recommend any bookings w ZenCity no one rectified all my issues and were rude about check out

Very cute apartment and nice layout  Windows along one side of the apartment and a coffee shop on the first floor made for a great experience  The apartment was very clean and had all the necessary basic needs while staying there  The one drawback was that it was very cold inside of the apartment  While we were there it was about    degrees outside but the windows are old and dont seem to completely seal  We could feel large amounts of cold air coming through from the bottom of the windows   The thermostat locked at    degrees which shouldve made it toasty but it still felt like mid   s  The location was great and overall the building was quiet  We would stay again in warmer weather  We enjoyed the location of this place and the layout  The only downside which is what caused us to give it less than five stars was how absolutely COLD it was inside the apartment   The thermostat was locked at    degrees which in most places would be fine but the windows were leaking a lot of cold air  Which made the apartment feel like it was quite cold throughout the stay  The place was a great value for the price and we would stay again if it was in the summer or spring

perfect for a quick trip where you just need somewhere to lay your head   host is very friendly and helpful  thank you for hospitality  my stay was okay but I was very disappointed with the cleanliness of the apartment   the couch has many stains and crumps on it  the curtains were filthy and are in desperate need of a wash or new ones all together  the walls have stains and cracks everywhere  just because you plastered over a crack doesnt mean you shouldnt pain over it to match the rest of the wall  doing that made the apartment look old and unattractive  the whole apartment needs a deep cleaning and fresh paint  The couch in the living room had so many stains on it I didnt want to sit on it  when one of the cushions fell off there were crumps under the cushions  the curtain in both the living room and bedroom were dirty  you can they havent been cleaned in a long time  all the walls had cracks and dirt spots all over them  they could use a good wipe down  the place is very outdated and doesnt show how it really looks in person

The communication was good but the place was unclean which raised a lot of concern especially during the current pandemic  After not being able to check in until      pm  throughout the rest of our stay we found things such as undergarments in the dryer and food left in the oven and microwave  I would suggest if you stay here to take pictures WITH time stamps of every single thing wrong  For the amount of money spent to stay there and the time wasted on getting the place cleaned and coming to some kind of reasonable resolution was not worth the money AT ALL  Will not be staying here again  I would suggest making sure the place is ready for the next guest so they wont go through the drama and filth I went through especially during COVID  For the amount of money spent to stay there and the time wasted on getting the place cleaned  obviously in a hurry since things were still left unclean  was not worth the money  Will not be staying here again  Could not check in in time due to room being unclean  Place was not cleaned by time my check in  Was ready by     pm

This place is in a great location and the beds were comfy  Unfortunately  everything else was rather disappointing  Given that they charged a high cleaning fee  I expected it to be cleaner than it was  The shower curtain  for example had a layer of mildew at the bottom of it  last     inches   A shower curtain is pretty easy to clean and or replace  There were also hairs all over the beds and bathtub    The hallway of the building constantly smelled of smoke as another reviewer pointed out and at times we could smell the smoke coming into the apartment   One thing to note is that its an old Chicago apartment building so it does get cold unless the radiator is running and I was pretty cold a good portion of the time   a space heater would have been nice   What sent us over the edge though is that the wifi wasnt working and the property managers took half a day to get back to us when we first reached out  if this was being managed by an individual we might have been more forgiving but its a company managing this property so their response time  in my opinion should have been fast  Hosts at every other Airbnb Ive ever stayed at have responded within the hour whenever Ive reached out during a stay    Overall  I would say that if you are not going to spend much time here other than to sleep  if you dont mind paying an overpriced cleaning fee  and if you dont ever need to use wifi  this might be a good spot for you

A cute cozy place right next to Forrest park  Very homey and so close to anything you may want to do in STL  Thank you for this cute little space  Loved it  Aside from the strong odor of cigarette upon arrival it really was a great place to stay  The kiosk was busted so I was sent to another location to get the key there was a little mix up as the cleabing ladybstill had the key but it was no ones fault  Everything was very clean for the most part  A few spots on the couch  But the biggest thing was a strong smell of cigarette smoke when we first got in the room  We opened the windows and it went away eventually  The cleaning lady also left the dust pile on the floor but that was an easy fix

The place was great  once we got in  We were notified    minutes before check in that we would not be able to check in at  pm due to the cleaners running behind  we understood and asked for updates on when we could return    hours later we didnt hear anything and had to call them and they said it still wasnt ready  They did say they would add that time to the end of our stay but when I asked for clarification on what time check out was they said it was the original   am  I told them that we shouldve got an extension and they didnt respond until   and a half hours later saying we could check out at  pm  well it was       and we had already said forget it and checked out by   am because of the long response time   We had issues with the lock  couldnt get in to the apartment for about    minutes  we called multiple times and after waiting a little bit we got a response  the woman was friendly and helped us get into the room eventually but after a long day of exploring the city the last thing you want is to be locked out of the apartment you paid for  The comforters on the beds were still damp when we went to sleep but not soaking wet  Other than those things it was a very cute place to stay  perfect location and it worked for us  Thank you for hosting us  We loved the apartment aside from the check in issue and the problem we had with the lock  once those things get fixed for future stays I think itd be perfect We were not able to check in until   hours past our original check in time  We were not notified of the issue until    minutes before check in and we were not given very clear updates on when we would be able to get into the Airbnb  The comforters were damp wet still  Problems with the lock and having to wait for someone to call us back and help us figure out the issue  we eventually did get in but after a long day exploring the city the last thing you want to do is be locked out of the apartment you paid for

Come for the gorgeous views  stay for the deep deep bathtub  In either arched window in the living room  you can see down the entirety of a street  Your apartment is on the corner of the building so light blasts through the windows each morning  It is difficult to get to  but once you get it  its no problem  There is a parking lot behind the building for     a night  and its close enough to walk groceries back and forth to  As far as the kitchen goes  there arent a whole lot of baking sheets to cook things on  so leave your frozen pizza at home  The cylindrical shower is cool  but can be VERY SLIPPERY  so be careful  The floor is not flat  its got an incline  The bathtub is where its at  being able to fit both me and my partner in comfortably  Overall  its very stylish but not very cozy besides the bedroom  Would be perfect for taking stylish pictures though  We tried to make a frozen pizza  but there were no cookie sheets or baking sheets to bake food on  Similarly  there is only one kind of knife  the serrated kind  to cut food with  More diverse kitchenware would have been helpful  since it is advertised as a full kitchen  the bathroom only has one rug for the shower and bathtub  I would place another so that you dont have to move it each time  There was no hand soap at the kitchen sink at all  We had to walk to the bathroom to wash our hands with hand soap  Lastly  I think it would make the place cozier  and more private  if every window had curtains  if there was simply more warmth as far as rugs or more furniture   Other than that  the views were amazing and the space was really unique

Much better than I could have hoped  The place itself is older  I feel that this doesnt show in the photos but I dont mind  I liked the old city charm  The location is amazing  I felt safe and it was close to everything in the city  especially the zoo and the science center  two places we wanted to make sure we visited  The location and size for the price is amazing  The only two suggestions I have is please consider buying some type of coffee maker  It was one thing I missed as I have no idea how to use a coffee press and thought it was odd there wasnt a regular coffee maker  Also  please consider adding curtains  Two out of the   bedrooms face the street and the lights are bright at night and the sun was shining bright through early in the morning  The blinds are fine but dont keep much light out  Overall  we loved our stay  The beds were amazing memory form and the comforter and pillows made us feel like we were sleeping in cuddly clouds  You just cannot beat it for the price  Much better than I could have hoped  The place itself is older  I feel that this doesnt show in the photos but I dont mind  I liked the old city charm  The location is amazing  I felt safe and it was close to everything in the city  especially the zoo and the science center  two places we wanted to make sure we visited  The location and size for the price is amazing  The only two suggestions I have is please consider buying some type of coffee maker  It was one thing I missed as I have no idea how to use a coffee press and thought it was odd there wasnt a regular coffee maker  Also  please consider adding curtains  Two out of the   bedrooms face the street and the lights are bright at night and the sun was shining bright through early in the morning  The blinds are fine but dont keep much light out  Also  The television remote is really going out and we could not get it to turn off the tv when we left  Overall we really enjoyed our stay and wanted to say thank you

The apartment has all amenities for a comfortable stay  The neighborhood is very downtown  therefore not the best area for exploring by foot  but central nonetheless  There were some minor things that needed attention in regards to cleaning  but the host was very communicative and Quick in responding  Check in had a few steps but following the instructions  was quite straightforward  Recommend for a stay where you need to be in the city Downtown with a fully functional place to stay  cooking  etc  Thank you for the good communication and quick responses  I appreciate the stay There were a couple of things that needed cleaning on the floors and rugs from previous tenants animal droppings  but the host was quick in responding and taking care of the matter A somewhat dangerous part of the city but very downtown and central

Communication with the host is AWFUL  If you try to call  youll only get an automated system asking you to leave a message  then youll never get a call back  If you message them  they are extremely slow to respond and not helpful  Dont bring anything valuable  they will have maintenance and who knows who else in and out of the apartment during your reservation without your permission or notifying you   I had a maintenance man show up in the middle of my stay to replace blinds  and he said he had been in earlier that day while I was out to lunch  I was never notified of his arrival nor did I give my permission   Great place as far as value   location  but I will never rent a place through  Zencity  again  Communication with the host is AWFUL  Dont bring anything valuable  they will have maintenance and who knows who else in and out of the apartment during your reservation without your permission or notifying you  Very poorly run business  Check in was to be anytime after  pm  I arrived at around      and there was someone inside the apartment and sounded to be playing video games  Thought this was hosted by a person  but its some sort of company  Tried to call and only got an automated message telling me to leave a message and theyd get back to me  soon   Never got a call back  Messages the host and they were extremely slow to respond  if at all   Also  in the middle of the day  a maintenance man arrived to replace blinds  I was NEVER notified that he would be there  not to mention that he said he had been there while I was out earlier in the day  also without my permission or being notified
